favourite.article: Father You are great and faithful. You have provided all that I needed. Thank You Lord.
Great is God's faithfulness all I needed He give me and I know He will perfect remaining In Jesus name.
Yes! He is so faithful, He has given me an opportunity to serve His purpose in my generation, as I celebrate my 45 birthday, my heart is overjoyed with His faithfulness!
He is truly faithful. He won't allow us to be tempted past that which we are able to bear. The faithfulness of our God.
I am going through a very rough time right now. This song is just what I needed to remind me that God is always faithful.
Indeed, He is faithfulness, and His faithfulness is great. What He says he would do, He does. Thank You Lord, for being faithful.
There is none worthy of praise. Indeed great is Thy faithfulness.

Indeed Daddy You are faithful and true. No matter what I may be going through, You remain Sovereign, Steadfast and Faithful. This song is indeed of great encouragement this morning. I have received new mercies this day. Thank You my Saviour, Friend and King.
Great is our Lord God....thanks for this song.
My Favorite hymn. Strength for today and a bright hope for tomorrow. Of a truth Great is God's Faithfulness Hallelujah!!!!!!

Tears come to my eyes...God is faithful and true in every situation. The whole earth/ nature testifies to this. No matter what you may be going through, God is more than able and will show Himself faithful. Praise God!

Quand j'écoute ce morceau et je me rappelle de tout ce que DIEU me fait, malgré tous mes errements, je ne peux m'empêcher de le remercier en criant et avec des Larmes aux yeux.... Tellement cette fidélité est au delà de tout entendement et de toute logique......SA FIDÉLITÉ DURE DEJA 29 ANS ..AUJOURD'HUI.... A LUI LA GLOIRE, A MOI SA GRÂCE.... AMEN
This is so wonderful. Enjoyed it very much.
Very beautiful.
It is extremely difficult to listen to and meditate with this song without tears. The faithfulness of God is just too overwhelming.
Faithful God! All I have needed Your hand has provided, Morning by morning new mercies I see! Wonderful. New and ever fresh! Realities of the Christ of God in us!
What a hymn for us to sing in church this day, as we celebrate our marriage anniversary. For us it has been grace upon grace, because God's faithful is really great upon us. Thank You our Father!

A very powerful testimony and witness to the greatness and steadfastness of God! Anchors me in God when the storms of life threaten to overtake and destroy me! Great is Thy faithfulness, and we are testimonies to it! To God be the Glory!

God's faithfulness defines who God is. In the midst of trial, temptation and oppression call on Him, because He is faithful to His words. He said call upon me in the days of trouble and I will deliver you. Am a living proof of His faithfulness because He has being faithful to me. To Him be all the glory.

This song tells of one of the most defining and indeed most eternally enduring qualities of God: His faithfulness. It will forever inspire one generation after another, for as long as Jesus tarries. Thank You Lord for Your faithfulness.
Thank You Lord Jesus, everything I needed Thou has provided. Thank You Lord Jesus for great and mighty revealing on to me. Lord Jesus, on to me. Lord Jesus. Thank You Jesus. Thank You Jesus.

Seemingly a simple song but in the depth of these words are revealed how the life hid in Christ and the Holy Spirit is truly to be lived. Always look up to Christ, amid the billows and waves of any of your current circumstances. They will pass, don't trust them; they are not how things will soon be. If they are harsh, then they are so, life is not falling apart but slowly falling into place. Expect God to move at any moment, know this, all you have needed Thy hand has provided. Stay the course, look up, great is Thy faithfulness. This song must be sung with confidence and purpose as an uplifting truth, because it is.
Really. Does it get any better than this? When you are walking in the Grace of the Trinity, this is what it sings like.
Just listening and singing the songs brings me PEACE through what I'm actually feeling right now. God is everything, everywhere and He is all I need.
I am so overwhelmed with the words of this hymn. It's so comforting to know that God is all I need and He is always with me!
This song is making me so happy.

Hmm, I feel like sharing tears of joy for listening to the lyrics of this song. Great is His faithfulness Lord God almighty, He's a faithful God, I've checked Him severally He never fails. I could remember how far He has gone with me in life's journey. Thank You the Host of earth, the immortal God that communicate with the mortal, the only true God that lives and never die. Great is Your faithfulness!
This hymn reminds me of the awesome nature and love of God. He loves me.
Singing this song live from my heart to God makes everything alive this great Monday morning. Bless the Lord.
Amen, He is always faithful! :)
I love this hymn. it reminds me of Gods unfailing love for me. Praise be to God Almighty.
First heard the hymn sung at the funeral service of a methodist minister in 2015, since have embraced and as become a part of my spritual journey.
This is a great song...
God is indeed great.
Each morning during my devotion, this song will ring loud in my heart. I enjoy singing it all the time. Indeed great is the faithfulness of our great God. He never sleeps nor slumbers.

Great indeed is God's faithfulness to me. He has been an irreplaceable father. My strength for today and bright hope for my tomorrow. Your faithfulness of the past is the assurance for trusting you for my future. Thank You Lord.
Thanks be to God!

In contemplation I sang out the chorus line to God in the joy of knowing that, "Great is His Faithfulness and All that I've needed He has provided." Praising His mercy and faithfulness at the beginning of this day.
This song really touched deep inside my heart. I see through this song that God has a plan for me. So now I give Him all my mind.
I want to give thanks to God. Today I went for my check up and I am cancer free for 5 years. Great is God's faithfulness. During these 5 years this hymn has been such an encouragement.
The Great Promise Keeper, Lord Jesus! A friend who stays closer than a brother, who will one day wipe every tear. Great Is Thy faithfulness!
Great is Thy faithfulness

Wanted to praise God today for His goodness in my life and faithfulness kept coming to mind. Had to read these lyrics. So glad I could sit and listen to this beautiful hymn and read the great words. Our God is good and great is His faithfulness - beyond what we can even imagine. Praise His name.
One of my favourite Hymns of all time--just listened to a unique tune on one of our Radio stations as we observe national mourning for one of our freedom fighters. Glory.
I Never tire of this wonderful hymn. "Great is Thy Faithfulness" is daily lifter of my head.

To 25th April, 2016, I just returned to the house in the evening and burst into a realm of glorifying God for - Great is the faithfulness of Him that made me in His image. Indeed, He is faithful even unto me that is not.

Thank you for offering the piano and guitar versions for playing this powerful hymn; yes, thanks for providing the accurate lyrics as well. Now I feel motivated to pick up my guitar, after years, just to play this and to make a joyful noise unto my Lord. Hats off to the lyricist; every word of this hymn is 100% true even when I am going through the trials of my life. What a blessing! HIS Faithfulness is HIS gift of love to me - to us all.
Indeed, He is faithful... Thank You, Lord!
God is faithful to fulfill even the smallest need of ours. Even if we forget, He will never.
My life has been like hell but I kept my faith and believed in Him who promised us because He is faithful. This song is happening right now in my life. Great is Thy faithfullness. Amen.

I have severally heard this song in the past without knowing the rich content of its wordings. Going through the wordings online recently has made it difficult for me stay a second without singing it. God you are good unto me. Great is really, really their faithfulness.
I grew up singing this hymn. They bring such clarity and joy when I sing them or hear it. Praise God!
Awoke with these words, thinking of a friend who lost a spouse and soulmate. Thought of my journey too - the Lord is ever - present and besides you all the way! What faithfulness! Thank You Lord.
It's one of my favourite hymns.. Great is His faithfulness towards me.. Thank You Father.
Thank You my God for Your love and for giving us eternal life through Your Son Jesus Christ whom I love! Great is thy faithfulness unto me. Amen!
Great song that lift my spirit and carry me throughout the whole day.
God reminded me of who He is again on this Good Friday! Thank You, Lord, for showing Your love through Your Son Jesus.

I was reading Psalm 116 this morning as part of the maundy Thursday readings. The word faithful sprang put at me and made me sing this song. Over the last few months I have suffered with financial and health problems but despite all of this God has been steadfast, loving and merciful. He has answered prayer and I rejoice in his faithfulness. Indeed it is great!

I always hear this song in my Grandfather's lyrical tenor. I accepted Jesus as my Lord and Saviour as a young girl and through all my life He has provided all I have need of. Today I woke hearing this in my head and feeling it in my soul. Yesterday I lost my job as a result of ever worsening health and today I went to register my paperwork for benefits. I am down, challenged and yet I am not afraid for He is with me, looking after my needs and directing my path. Thank You Father for never failing in the promises Thou hast made, Great is Thy Faithfulness Lord unto me.

Thank you for providing this music for us. I am so happy that I could sing this song to God. I am so grateful forHhis love, compassion, mercy, and support. You helped me to celebrate Him. God bless you!
He is God. JehovaModimo is Your name.

I awoke this morning with this song on my mind. It was quite fitting as I reflect on it in light of a recent chronic illness. God has been faithful, He has provided not only my sustenance but care in my healing. Hallelujah Jesus! I'm learning to "Let go and let God".
This song always inspires my soul, and uplifts my spirit man to where I allow nothing to separete me from God's loving arms and provision!
This song woke me up this morning.... It reminded me of how faithful God is amidst all that I am going through.. He is still faithful...Hallelujah..
Great song that lift my soul, quench the hungry in the spirit and build me up. Thank You Jesus.
My family has learned this hymn. Beautiful and true. Praise be to God in the highest!
Today 10th of March, I give thanks to God for His faithfulness in my life! Indeed I join saints through ages past to attest to the faithfulness of God - constant and never failing!
I woke this morning, a bright new day and the 1st of March 2016 this song Great is thy Faithfulness is my signal tune because God has been faithful to me and my family.
Great is Thy faithfulness, greater still Thy love and grace.
He is a faithful and ever loving father. Every time I sing this song or hear this song, my heart swells up and my eyes flood with tears. Thank You Lord!
Morning by Morning new mercies I see, thank You Lord for unfailing love.
I woke up this morning with this song. I am having child care problems. I thank God my Father for His faithfulness. For His mercies are renew every morning.
Every time I sing this song I can remember the greatness of God. All my worries will be erased, and He always will be glorified.

Starting quiet time this morning and this song came to my mind. I love the beautiful truth and melody of this hymn! Thank you for this site and the full lyrics and information it provides! Bless you for coordinating it all.
During my morning meditation the refrain was ringing in my soul. Great is God's faithfulness to us all. We don't get what we deserve, but receive God's mercy. Amazing!
I woke up with this song on my lips a few days ago. I had to find the full lyrics. Thank you and God bless you.

I also woke up with this song on my lips. My brother n law had a stroke Mon. and on Fri. he left the hospital, walking, talking & could see. God's mercies & to show us he will need heart surgery with in 5 yrs. My hope & faith continues thur Jesus Christ for me that my husband a prodigal will return. Our God is faithful & full of grace and mercies we do not deserve.

I woke up this morning and God have me this song that I could not sing off heart. I decided to check it up in my hymn books (3) and to my surprise this song was not there; decided I look for it online. Thank God I was able to know God's mind concerning me and my household. So grateful.
My wife is in labor, that song come to my might "Great is thy faithfulness" I am singing and praying.
So inspired! It lifted my soul.
Nice one

Woke up singing this great hymn and giving praise to the Lord for His great faithfulness to me and my family. I am thankful for the great hymns of the faith that communicate the truths of Scripture and for the authors who penned the words sung by Christians around the world.
My best hymn. Indeed great is God's faithfulness.
My favourite song. Happy to come across it on this site. God bless you.
All I have needed Thy hand hath provided— “Great is Thy faithfulness,” Lord, unto me! I thank God for my life and my children. Tumi
Great is the faithfulness of God. Today is Sunday. It has been snowing since Friday. We have 22 inches of snow. I am witnessing the testimony of the second verse of hymnal.
This song calms me down and cheers me up!
When I watch our fallen solders, this is the only consolation I have... indeed great is Thy faithfullness O Lord.

Thank you so much. "Great is they Faithfulness", is just one of my many favourite Hymns! But will be amongst those Hymns that I choose for the time when God calls me back home! God Bless you for helping me to achieve that.

When I lost my son and the pastor asked what do you need. I told him I needed a word. He quoted Romans 8:38-39 nothing in all creation can separate us from the love of God that is in Christ Jesus. I couldn't believe it, there was no condemnation. Morning by morning new mercies I see. My son even had a tattoo. Psalm 23:4 yea though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death I will fear no evil for God is with me. Our family and many friends went and got the tattoo. God knew summer, winter, springtime and harvest we would need a constant reminder of his presence to cheer and guide us. Great is Thy faithfulness Lord unto me!

I was given some tragic news from my brother 5:30PM last night. It's truly made me see even more that God's faithfulness is still here and present with us. He never changes, He's our strength, hope, and guide. He wants to cheer and give us blessings. Truly His love is beyond comprehension, unconditional, and eternal. Praise God!
Great is His faithfulness... Truly, it goes beyond us, beyond our sin and neglect, beyond anything we do or don't do. He is ever faithful.

God was Faithful, is Faithful, and will FOREVER BE FAITHFUL. He changest not, His WORDS are TRUE AND AMEN. Whatever He has said about Me shall SURELY come to Pass. Just Trusting and Obeying HIM. THANK YOU JESUS.

Truly a very faithful God. He's big enough to full the entire universe and galaxies with Him presence yet small enough to meet the most intricate needs of each and every individual. He is really faithful.
Indeed great is His faithfulness. All that I ever needed God had made provision.
"Strength for today and bright hope for tomorrow." Yes, thank You Lord for the unwavering hope You provide.
Indeed morning by morning new mercies I see...every single day You shower me and my family with great and wonderful things..Thank You Lord.
"All that I needed Thy hand has provided".
Lord, You have been faithful to me and my family, may Your name alone be magnified for ever. Amen.
Great is Thy faithfulness indeed!! God has walked with me a challenging journey of 2015. He blessed us as a family and took us through one of the tough years we have shared as a family.
Indeed Great is God's faithfulness.
This site is wonderful! Great is Thy Faithfulness!!!!
Praise God for His faithfulness to us! Thank you so much for making this site available to sing hymns along with your music. God bless you.
Indeed the Lord has been Faithful to me & my family ... Thank You Lord.
Thou changest not, Thy compassions, they fail not As Thou hast been Thou forever wilt be. (Good Father).
Pardon for sin and peace that endures...thank You Jesus!

I join with you all in manifold witness. I was praying this morning and acknowledged the faithfulness of our Father and began singing this song to Him. I wanted to have the words all right so I ended up here. GREAT IS THY FAITHFULNESS Lord! I trust You to Finish the good work you have begun in me and ALL who love You and look for Your Son's appearing.
Great is Thy faithfulness. I love You LORD. Thank You LORD.
Indeed Great is Thy Faithfulness! I worship You most Holy!
Hymn of appreciation to God for seeing us through 2015. Thank You Lord.
As the year 2015 ends my words is sum up in this hymn.
God is too faithful.
This has always been my story knowing God's faithfulness through the chapters of my life. I have chosen this for singing at my funeral when the Lord calls me Home!

Sitting in my car at this very moment listening to Kiki Shierd sing this song and I'm so full right now! Lord we are undeserving yet You are still A JUST, MERCIFUL, LOVING, FAITHFUL GOD! Thank You Lord for just being Lord all by Yourself!
God is indeed Faithful. His Faithfulness indeed endures forever. God is so good and all that He has done to man is actually anchored on God's Faithfulness. Praise The Lord!!!
Thank You Lord. You love us despite our failings and deceptions. Thank You for not only adding another year to my life but blessing me and showing me the side of You I had not known.
Just when the thought of giving up comes, He proves He is God!
God's faithfulness is always great and I am most grateful to God. He has added another year to my life. He has been faithful to me.
Great is God's faithfulness in us no...unto His people...the bride saith too. Yes? Yes.
GOD You are Great, You are GOD All by Yourself unchangeable Merciful Father I THANK YOU LORD.
Our God is always faithful, loving and kind. Thank You Lord for everything You have blessed us with. Beautiful song with meaningful lyrics and music.
Great is God's faithfulness, whether we have been faithful or not...
Beautiful song! I love God for His faithfulness....
I love this song!
Thank You God for Thy Faithfulness
Indeed His faithfulness endure forever. Father we adore You.
Day by day I always experience God's faithfulness.
Love love.... God's greatness is truly felt with this praise hymn..
We love You so much Lord. Thank You.

Woke up this morning singing this song in memory of my mother on today which would have been the anniversary of her 100th birthday her most favorite song on my way to morning service feeling so thankful not only for God in my life but for having a Godly mother who taught me the right way to serve God.
In prayer this evening and confessing and believing in the Faith for things to come to pass! This song came to my mind... I'm forever grateful for God's faithfulness!

My favourite saying of all time is "God is faithful". His faithfulness is not dependent on what we do or don't do. The Bible says that even in our unfaithfulness He remains faithful because He cannot deny Himself. I draw strength from the truth that His word will always come to pass because He is faithful to watch over it. Grant me grace to hold firmly to Your word Lord. Great is Thy faithfulness!!!

I had been singing this song for months and last Sunday they ended service with Great is Thy Faithfulness. Everytime I hear it it does something to me I am thankful for God's hand and power in my life.
Great indeed is the faithfulness of God. He bestows his blessings on us each day. I am grateful to you Lord.

I woke up this morning with this song running through my mind. I thank God for this as we are burying my 20 yr old grandson today. Now I know The Comforter will be with me today. I thank God for His presence with me today.
The Lord's faithfulness is forever. He is a present help in times of trouble. Blessed be the name of the Lord!
Vs. 3 really reached me this morning. Dark clouds of injustice crowd in, but for tomorrow there is bright hope!
Had a dream... This song was sung in the dream... Lord great in deed is thy faithfulness morning by morning.. Am so grateful...
Truly great is Thy fathtfulness to those who put their trust in the Lord. May His name be glorified forever.

"Great is His faithfulness" Lord unto me. I give thanks for all the blessings that have bee bestowed on me. The words of this hymn are very special for me especially over the last 2 months. I was glad to find the words once again on the Internet.
Soothes my pain, calms all of my fears... Anything, Every time.

My pastor started teaching a series on the subject of Faithfulness in Bible class on last night, November 18, 2015. As I was in my prayer time this morning, the hymn Great is thy Faithfulness came into my spirit. I started to sing it and before I knew it .....I was caught up in worshipping my God. Bless His name. Hallalujah. Prior to the singing, I was reading Lamentations 3:21-23. God is so good and so faithful.
Praising God for His faithfulness in all things!
Can you all feel it. There is a great awakening going on in the world with God's people.The King is coming. Oh Lord our God how majestic is Thy name in all the earth.
God is Faithful!

As I laid here this morning, I remember speaking to my niece yesterday who was diagnosed with stage 3 cancer and when I asked her how is it going, and she replied, "there WERE two lumps but they couldn't find any," I couldn't do anything but lift my hands to Heaven and hug her because God answered prayers. This morning this song came to my mind in the midst of laying here listening to The Message of The Cross on SBN and I couldn't remember the second verse onwards so I googled it and I praise God that His Holy Spirit had His way. This I believe is the Lord reminding me of His Compassion, Blessings, Faithfulness for He's not a man that He should lie nor the son of man that He should repent. Praise God, Hallelujah. I don't know who out there is reading this right now but know God can change your situation, He's already taken care of it through The Cross of Jesus Christ and Him Crucified, just believe, Be encouraged. The blessing of the Lord , it maketh rich, and he addeth no sorrow with it. Proverbs 10:22 KJV
Indeed God is faithful when you consider all the works His hands have made especially in my family. Thank You God.

I was very "religious" until my early 20"s, I didn't derail but I certainly lost my faith, considering myself too smart or "scientific" to blindly accept God. I use to laugh at postings I see here, considering you hypocritical and ignorant. I was in control of my own destiny until I wasn't; God didn't exist until He did. I am not here to preach, but to thank God for not giving up on me for I am certainly unworthy — the last few months have been so powerful, I continue to struggle to some degree and then we have a tragedy, a sacrifice that unites and reawakens faith around the world and humble kid that sings His praise on our behalf.

One more thing...i mentioned Jordan Smith singing this Gorgeous Hymn on "The Voice" last night. But I forgot to mention that he has a Gift from God voice. Literally, the voice of an Angel. Not only did our Holy Father give him the Gift of an Entertaining sound..but in His Unmatchable FAITHFULNESS He Poured it into Jordan's blessed heart to pick this Glorious song and Fill the whole world with an Angelic Tune with soul Strengthening Words that we all need to hear! By the way...Jordan's version is #1 on iTunes right now!! Thank You Holy Faithful Father!! Your Mysterious Ways are so Perfect!! Thank You Jesus for Loving us so much..You took our Stripes to make us Brand New!! I bow before the Throne of Grace and Pray that You Send Peace to the reader of this message and all of Your Children that are Scattered all over the planet! We Love and Worship You, Forevermore, Amen!

God is the Most Faithful Creator! Last night on a television singing contest this song was sang by a man named Jordan Smith. It's no coincidence that this song was chosen. Many of us across the globe are grieving and praying compassionately for our fellow humans in Paris, Syria and every other place that is un-peaceful at this time in earth's His-Story! 1 Corinthians 10:13 says.."There bath no temptation (or tragedy) taken you but such is common to (all) man; but God is Faithful who will not allow you to be tempted (troubled) above that you are able; but will with the temptation(or trial) also make a way to Escape that you may be able to bare it!" Jesus Christ's Holy Spirit-Heaven in our heart (Luke 17:20-21) is where we can Escape to anytime anywhere we are! No matter what the enemy or anyone says or does!! God is in Control of His Universe!! And to Him Belongs all Glory! Amen!
He is Faithful!

As I sat before the Lord this morning this anointed song brought back memories of my grandmother playing on her piano and singing. As I reflect to the storms of life the Lord has carried us through many times I sang this song. Multiple times we will told by doctors the both of our sons would not be able to live. My husband and I would look into the faces of the doctors and nurses and explain to them we will never give up hope until God so chooses to either sustain our sons lives or take them home to be with him. Both of our sons now have defied all odds and are living testimony of God's intervention. As you listen to this song today cling to words and let it minister to the depths of your soul and whatever situation you're walking through.
This hymn is so powerful no matter what the situation, this hymn reminds us that He is great and His faithfulness far exceeds our faithlessness.
This is my favorite hymn to sing.
Oh yes, indeed great is thy faithfulness morning by morning new mercies I see. Thanks be to Jehovah Ropheka.
I am in Paris. This hymn was part of the service at the American Church yesterday. We prayed for our grieving friends, for the innocent, and for our enemies.
All that I have needed,all that I will need,YOUR hand Oh! the AlMIGHTY LORD is forever faithful towards me. Thank You JESUS CHRIST.
Great is Thy faithfulness indeed oh Lord......I am grateful to You Lord... in spite of all the troubles and pain, You are faithful. ....
I have been listening to hymns all the time as I drive a lot. I downloaded this hymm as sung by the Celebration Choir. Thus far this is my most favorite. It's dreamily inspiring. Thank You Jesus.
Indeed great is God Almighty His faithfulness endureth forever. I will always praise you my God for Your love in my life and family. How gracious are You Lord. I worship You Abba Father.
I will be celebrating my 59th birthday tomorrow and im overwhelmed just thinking of God's faithfulness! This hymn popped in my mind this morning and been singing all the time! Beautiful lyrics!
Lord I am so grateful for Your Love, Faithfulness and Goodness towards me and my family.
Lord, I will never fully understand the depth of Your faithfulness but I am so greatful that I can always turn to You as my faithful Lord and Savior.
Lamentations 3:21-26

It dose not matter what I see or feel I will sing unto the Lord a joyful song and praise His name for the Lord is good, great indeed is Your faithfulness my God. You that never fail. My Child is preserved in my womb, the bleeding is nothing but a mirage. I live by the word of God and His report. I work by faith not by sight. Glorrrrrrrrrrrrrrrryyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy.

Oh, what a Savior. Thank You for creating me and loving me unconditionally. Thank You for my wonderful family and for all the blessings. I am old now and going thru some trials now, but You are EVER faithful and will help me through them. I will sing praises to You forever, my Jesus, my God!!
Faithful and gracious is our GOD.
God is great and faithful all the time. We just need to trust Him.

I knelt down and asked for healing, His mighty right hand did it. Who else shows mercy and showers grace unending, He asks for nothing in return. My God you are ever faithful. I'll sing this song forever, Your praise shall never depart from my lip.

God is indeed faithful. He changes not! There is indeed no shadow of turning in You dear God. The past week I went through a trial and I was wondering if God was really there for me. The Spirit of God kept telling me to hold on and not let go of my faith in Him. but I couldn't even pray; just uttering a few words here and there. The storm is over and I can say that Great is His Faithfulness indeed.

His faithfulness is great, Thank You Almighty God for Your faithfulness, especially when I am not. I Thank You Heavenly Father for giving Your son Jesus in place of sinner like me, Jesus has washed us so we can sit at Your throne. Thank You Heavenly Father, Jesus and Holy Spirit. This song was one of my favorites when our children attended Christian school, they played it in chapel, Dear Lord I pray my children will one day really commit their lives to You and really wake up to a life of service to You, not part time but 24/7 365 days a year, Thank You in the name of Jesus that You wait patiently for us.

When I feel the sky falling on my head, when it's all tears inside, when all I can see, it's walls all around, I just remember the faithfulness of My GOD, I stop worry about things and let His Joy make my soul sing once again and again...GOD IS WONDERFUL!
Yes oh Great is Thy faithfulness O Lord.
Indeed great is God's faithfulness to me, this is one of my best songs, it gives me joy and hope, thank You Jesus.
Great is God's faithfulness! He never fail me nor forsake me in all circumstances. His grace and mercy never fails.
My God is awesome!!! Day by day!
He is the constant faithful rock and high tower where my soul can rest.
I woke up this morning with this song on my lips, Lord rekindle the fire of Your presence in my life I pray in Jesus name.
When I wake up this morning this song was ringing a bell in my heart. Am blessed today.
Thank you for this, beautiful words for an awesome God.
God has been faithful to me and He's always there for me when I call. What an awesome God You are.
I am struck again with how amazing my God is. His mercies are new every morning. Yesterday is forgiven and wiped clean. I will trust in Him!

God is constantly looking out for us. He is our eyes and ears. In the darkness he brings light. He restores our soul. He loves us immensely. Who shall enter the kingdom of God - His faithful people! The earth is the Lord's! REJOICE IN THE LORD!
Amen! Praise God for His faithfulness even when I've been unfaithful. What an Awesome God we serve!
O Lord have mercy on me, a sinner.
Christ is the Saviour.
God's faithfulness is bigger and more sure than life, He is the only one THAT DOES NOT HAVE THE ABILITY TO LIE OR FAIL

This got me caught up in my spirit. I came here looking for the lyrics of this song. But am stuck singing this awesome song to the extend that I can't stop singing God's faithfulness to us humans. Glory be to God!
I love this song. It shows me how wonderful Jesus is to us. Great is Thy faithfulness!
Jehovah is indeed faithful. Always a refreshing time when I think on God's faithfulness. Hallelujah!!!

Woke up this morning singing the hymn. It dawn on me that God's faithfulness and mercies keeps me going and gives me assurance for a next tomorrow in a world where one is looked at an option when others are taken as a priority. He is indeed a faithful God,father, husband and everything to me.
Our God in indeed very faithful, despite the challenges of life, He never fails. Thank You Lord.
May the Lord open our eyes to His acts of faithfulness that we may miss noticing because of the business and distractions of life. Lord allow Your people to see and give praise to You...
His mercy morrning by morning I experience..waking every morning is His mercy indeed...AM saved by his Mercy...Thank God!

How faithful He is to care for us, shepherd us and deliver us, whether in this life or in bringing us to the next life. This past Saturday, my wife Cindy and I went to a celebration of life tribute to a young girl, Amanda. She was only 22 years old and had died the Saturday before after struggling more than 12 years against cancer. There was more than 500 people at this service, people who she knew and touched with her spirit and smile. I had never met her, but my wfe had transported her to school on her school bus many times and was definitely one of those who had been touched by her. You see, in spite of all her sufferings, Amanda was a joy to all those who knew her. Never complaining about her own pain, her concern was for how eveyone else felt. Very cheerful with an infectious smile, she was the one who cheered everyone else. Great sense of humor, loved her family, her schoolmates and her church groups. This hymn was played at the service and it was perfect for the occasion. God Bless!

I belong to a church of the Pentecostal teaching. It makes me so sad and at times angry that this last Palm Sunday morning five songs with words and melody I nor anyone else in that small congregation had ever heard were sung. My Pastor is convinced that these songs or much more likely chants put to music will draw people. No it will not. I repeat, no it will not. If you do not specifically sing about Jesus,by name, the blood and the cross, if you do NOT praise the Lord, then nothing spiritual will happen. At first singing this new age stuff was to draw the young. That did not work out so well, for a very long time we have not had a new, unsaved person enter our church. Then it was, well we will sing ONE hymn ever. I am not going to be there for what you mistakenly call worship service. And even that has passed. This week, I am going to tell the Pastor that if we do not start to sing the songs that have drawn millions to Christ, and begin to prioritize the time honored hymns, I will not be there to sing stuff with words that do not stir my heart or anyone else. I will find a place near the building, turn on my portable cd player and listen to what I KNOW heals a troubled heart.

George Beverly Shea in "How Sweet the Sound": At Moody Bible Institute I met the composer of this song, Mr. William Runyan. A tall, delightful gentleman in his 70's, Mr. Runyan taught piano and voice in the fine music department there. We became good friends; it was an honor for me to spend time with Mr. Runyan and learn from him, for he was well-versed in hymnology. I was so pleased when he would call me at the radio department and say, "When you have an opportunity, come over. I'd like to play for you a new song I'm working on." He had great talent for writing inspiring music. This man's enthusiasm was incredible. He was always victorious and happy in the Lord. Thomas Chisholm was born in a log cabin in Kentucky and wrote more than 1200 poems. In 1923, he sent the words of this hymn to Mr. Runyan. Upon reading these words, Mr. Runyan knew he had received a precious message that could touch lives around the world. He prayed that God would help him compose music that was uplifting and joyous. God answered that prayer. This hymn of praise has become a great favorite with congregations everywhere. Cliff Barrows and I had an opportunity to meet Thomas Chisholm, at a senior care center. We found him seated on a park bench and talked with him for a little while. What a dear soul! He could have been thinking about his divinely-inspired words as he sat there under the trees: "Strength for today and bright hope for tomorrow. Blessings all mine with 10,000 beside!" "O God my Father," Your love has never failed me. Through each season of my life, You have been present. Thank You for Your faithfulness.

“GREAT IS THY FAITHFULNESS” is one of my favorite songs and we never sing it enough! This song says what I can't express in my own words. The LORD has provided me more than I could possibly ask or even imagine. "I have been young and now I'm old and I have never seen the righteous forsaken, nor his descendants begging for bread." (Psalms 37:25) Great indeed is His faithfulness! I've learned over the years of my life that God's timing is always perfect. When you wait for Him, even in the midst of uncertainty, He will always be with you. As I look back over 70+ years, I can truly say that God has been faithful to me! It is easy to look at the things around me that I don't have and grumble. But, when I really take time to reflect, I see how His hand has been at work...... guiding, directing, supplying, blessing, year after year, He remains so faithful, and He keeps me in the palm of His hand, where no one can remove me. Lord, I love You, worship You, and I give You thanks and praise and honor for what You have done for me. LORD You truly are faithful. Thank You Lord for loving me and being my Redeemer!

I was singing this in my head and just had to search up the rest of the lyrics. Truly, great is Your faithfulness O God my Father. Lately, I've been doubting the very existence of God and then He planted this song in my heart, and just hearing it uplifted me. I'm faithless literally but He remains faithful! He keeps in the palm of His hand, and nobody can snatch me from Him. Praise You Lord!

Today this song has been in my head, me and my partner have been trying for a baby for 4yrs now but have had no joy even with IVF. For the past two days I have been really down and alone, even suicide has cross my mind. I had to get the words for this song and I can't stop singing it, this song has given me strength to carry on. I'm going to print the words and sing it every day until I overcome. Great is Thy faithfulness and I thank You Lord for being so faithful towards me. I give You thanks and praise for what You have done and for what You are about to do.

On February 2, 2012, I requested prayer on this website for our son (50 years old) to get a job after 3 1/2 years without a job. He is a Christian and an excellent computer programmer, but downsizing and a thing called "unemployment discrimination" worked against him. During that time he lost his condo and all contents; he became homeless and lived in his car. On July 24, 2012, he started a new job and was able to move into a motel. he immediately instituted a program of debt reduction and declared a year of austerity. In November (?) he moved into a new condo. I thank the Lord that He saw us through this heart wrenching time. Great is Thy faithfulness, Lord, unto us! All praise to our Heavenly Father forever!

Lamentations 3: 22-23 "Because of the Lord's great love, we are not consumed, for His compassions never fail. They are new every morning; great is Your faithfulness."
Sometimes we come to work and it feels like there is a brick wall – nothing is going right, or so it seems. We may not be at the point of giving up, but the thought crosses our mind before we chase it away.
In the midst of all the struggles, drama, and hard work, we remember why we are here. We remember what God calls us to do. We remember that we are certainly not alone, but His presence and power and promises equip us.
And like God refreshed Isaiah after his confrontation with Jezebel when Isaiah was tapped out, God also refreshes us. He allows us rest, He ministers to us, and His Word gives us strength and encouragement.
Each day then brings afresh a new message of God's mercy. We can say with Jeremiah: "Because of the Lord's great love, we are not consumed, for His compassions never fail. They are new every morning; great is Your faithfulness."
We can sing the great hymn of faith: Great is Thy faithfulness, O God my Father.
This hymn makes me sober and teary. I am eternally grateful and indebted to my Lord and Saviour, Jesus.

Now 23 years later, I will sing it with my wife to open our Home Marriage Bible Study (2=1).

While many of our congregations will sing patriotic songs this Sunday (1 July) or next, this hymn is a setting of Lamentations 3, Jeremiah's "patriotic song" in the context of Israel's behavior 600 years before Jesus. The "lament" is a classical form of Hebrew poetry: identifying woe, acknowledging sin, and here confessing faith in God's grace, forgiveness, and restoration. An excellent message for us today and tomorrow.

This is my favourite hymn. The words mean so much to me and I use this song often in my personal praise and worship time.

My pastor sang this wonderful hymn today after his sermon and since I didn't know the words decided to use the internet to search for it. I have been a Christian all my life but it wasn't until I lost everything I had worked hard for that I really came to know God and gave my life to Him. I will be 47 on July 3rd and lived and worked in London for 13yrs and decided to come back home and start my own business. I thought I had it all. Life was really great and even though I was a Christian (had been all my life) I had not committed myself to God and accepted Jesus as my Saviour until ny business and fortunes hit the rocks and I lost everything but found Jesus. I can't stop telling the world how happy I am now. His mercies are abundant in my life. I don't leave to count my money or treasures but now I leave for Him in love and count my blessings in His holy name. The words of this song touched my heart so much that for the first time in my life I wanted to testify to the Lord for His faithfulness and blessings in my life. Thank You Jesus for Your glory. I can't leave another day without giving You the glory. Thanks be to God. Amen.

I was singing this song this morning and was forgetting words and what not, but I hit that CHORUS and just began to cry out to the LORD! Ahhhh I am just believing and counting on GOD! His word can NOT come back having done nothing.

There is not enough space here to share the way God has been faithful to me in the 72 years of my life! Early this morning I sat, preparing a sermon called "The faithfulness of God" in which I recall some of the incidents of His faithfulness to me. My testimony is that it is impossible to outgive God!! Give Him your life in humble service and He will just pour on the blessings. Sometimes life can be very difficult and circumstances very discouraging. Those are the times that our Father uses to perfect our faith! He doesn't cause them, but He certainly uses them. If we trust Him in those times, we learn that His love never fails, and we look back and see why He lead us as He did. If you are young in the faith, take it from an old fellow who has lived both sides of life - the life of serving self and the life of serving God for 40 years. Not only is it safe to trust Him, it is a truly amazing and fulfilling journey. He will never fail you if you trust Him completely. Obviously the author of this hymn experienced the same thing. God bless you friend! Look me up in heaven and tell me your story!

I really love this song cause God is so real and so faithful! How can I forget all my tears, problems which I almost give up! Amen, God is faithful and I felt His presence in our family. He made all the impossible things possible. I want to shout how FAITHFUL HE IS! AMEN.

Oh there is such joy in my heart when I realize He is real, He is faithful and He hears all my cries. My soul longeth for Him. He fails not. I started singing it aloud and I didn't care if it woke up anyone!

Although we are unfaithful, God is faithful. Lamentations 3:23b says, "Great is Your faithfulness." The chorus of a well-known hymn on God's faithfulness (Hymns, #19) says, "'Great is Thy faithfulness!' 'Great is Thy faithfulness!' / Morning by morning new mercies I see; / All I have needed Thy hand has provided—/ 'Great is Thy faithfulness,' Lord, unto me!" We may understand what the Bible says and what this hymn says about God's faithfulness either in a natural way or in a spiritual way. When you sing this hymn, how do you understand the word faithfulness? If you understand God's faithfulness in a natural way, you may think that He is faithful primarily in the matter of material provisions or physical blessings. When some say that God is faithful, they mean that He is faithful to take care of their material needs. However, in 1 Corinthians 1:9 Paul says, "God is faithful, through whom you were called into the fellowship of His Son, Jesus Christ our Lord." God is faithful in this matter, but He may not be faithful to provide you a large house or a well-paying job. I would not deny the fact that God is faithful in caring for our welfare. My point is that God's faithfulness is not according to our natural understanding.
Consider the sufferings of the apostle Paul. He was called, commissioned, burdened, and sent by God, but wherever he went he had troubles. For example, as soon as he began to preach Christ, he began to suffer persecution. He even had to escape from Damascus by being lowered down the wall in a basket. Does this mean that God was not faithful to Paul? No, it means that God's faithfulness is not according to our natural understanding.
When we believed in the Lord Jesus, we might have expected to have peace and blessing. But instead we might have had many troubles and might have lost our security, our health, or our possessions. When some Christians experience such things, they may question God's faithfulness and ask why He did not prevent hardships from happening to them.
We need to realize that in allowing us to have troubles, God is faithful in His purpose to turn us from idols and bring us back to Himself. Our peace, safety, health, and possessions may become idols to us, and God is faithful to take these things away so that we may drink of Him as the fountain of living waters. If our house or our possessions become idols to us, we drink of them and not of God. God's faithfulness is a matter of dealing with these idols and causing us to drink of Him.
God is faithful in leading us into His economy, and His economy is for us to drink Christ, to eat Christ, to enjoy Christ, to absorb Christ, and to assimilate Christ that God may have His increase with us to fulfill His economy. This is God's faithfulness.
Instead of drinking of God as the fountain of living waters, Israel drank of their idols. Therefore, God used the Babylonians to deal with these idols and also to destroy Jerusalem and even the temple, which had become an idol to them. We need to see that we are not better than Israel. Anything can become an idol to us. But God is faithful in fulfilling His economy. In His faithfulness He deals with our idols that we may drink of Him. We all need to drink of God as the fountain of living waters, receiving Christ into us and assimilating Him, so that He may increase for the fulfillment of God's economy to have His expression through His counterpart.
Whereas God is faithful, we are neither faithful nor chaste but go to many other husbands. After failing God, we may receive some mercy and grace and therefore repent and weep, saying, "How pitiful I am! For a long time I have not loved the Lord very much, and I have not attended the meetings." While we are repenting and weeping, God is rejoicing. However, if we repent and weep too much, even our repentance may become an idol. We may testify in a meeting, saying that we have thoroughly repented to God. But this may be a matter of self-boasting and be a self-made idol. Therefore, after repenting, we should begin to drink of the living waters, praising God, giving thanks to Him for everything, and enjoying Him. This is what God wants. God is not interested in anything other than our enjoyment of Christ.
Source: Life-study of Jeremiah, chapter 4.

Jeremiah's speaking in Lamentations 3:22-26 is another pattern of prophesying: "It is of the Lord's mercies that we are not consumed, because his compassions fail not. They are new every morning: great is thy faithfulness. The Lord is my portion, saith my soul; therefore will I hope in him. The Lord is good unto them that wait for him, to the soul that seeketh him. It is good that a man should both hope and quietly wait for the salvation of the Lord." Jeremiah told us that it is of the Lord's mercies that we are not consumed. This is not foretelling but blessing, well-speaking. He told us that the mercies, the compassions, of the Lord are new every morning. We need to learn to prophesy in this way. Jeremiah told the Lord, "Great is thy faithfulness." There is a well-known hymn based upon this verse (Hymns, #19). Jeremiah also said that the Lord was his portion. It is marvelous that there was a prophet in the Old Testament who knew that the Lord was his portion. When we tell others that the Lord is our portion, we are speaking the Lord to them.
Source: The Present Advance of the Lord's Recovery, chapter 4.
